Message.Title: Dell is producing modified versions of Msft Surface
Message.Msg: Windows 8 will allow PC makers to compete in the tablet market. In a year, there will be modified beter versions of Msft Surface, which right now is the only laptop with a touchpad, it looks a bit like frakenstein with the leg stand and detachable flat keyboard with NO FEEL for the keys (why bother, why don't they just use the touchpad keyboard). The later versions (from Dell/ MSFT/HP)of Laptop-touchpad combo will have real keyboard with touchscreen that can swivel 180. Or a keyboard that folds behind the touchpad-- allowing both functions of laptop and touchpad.
